data.comment: Simone Sozza starts the match. Spal with the kick-off in Verona.
Simone Sozza awards Spal a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Verona in their own half.
Throw-in Spal.
Verona to take a throw-in in Spal territory.
In the minute 3, Valentin Eysseric for the home team is judged to be offside.
Ball safe as Spal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Spal.
In the minute 7, Verona's Samuel Di Carmine scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Darko Lazovic.
Verona's Fabio Borini is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Verona have been awarded a corner by Simone Sozza.
Verona have a goal kick.
Verona take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Samuel Di Carmine.
In the minute 11, Federico Dimarco with an assist there.
Simone Sozza awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Spal at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 15, Matteo Pessina gets his shot on target but fails to score for Verona.
Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Verona.
Corner awarded to Verona.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Spal in their own half.
Samuel Di Carmine (Verona) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Verona.
In the minute 20, Simone Sozza signals a Spal throw-in in Verona's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Verona goal kick.
In Verona a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Spal drives forward and Andrea Petagna gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Spal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Verona's half?
Spal needs to be cautious. Verona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 28, Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Verona in their own half.
Free kick for Spal in the half of Verona.
Throw-in for Spal at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Spal at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
Spal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Spal in their own half.
In the minute 31, Can Verona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spal's half?
Simone Sozza blows against Verona's Federico Dimarco for offside.
Simone Sozza signals a free kick to Spal just outside Verona's area.
In the minute 34, Mohamed Fares for Spal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Verona goal kick.
Spal are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 36, Spal's Georgi Tunjov breaks free at Marc Antonio Bentegodi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Verona.
Federico Dimarco of Verona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 40, In Verona Verona drive forward through Samuel Di Carmine. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Verona Verona attack through Federico Dimarco. The finish is off target, however.
Simone Sozza awards Spal a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Free kick Spal.
Verona have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Verona.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Spal at Marc Antonio Bentegodi.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Verona.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
